name: Moonlights lite
description:
Moonlights is a high quality tower building puzzle game.


"As is, the game is good, but the ability to create your own levels (online, in a Flash-supporting Web browser) and play levels created by the Moonlights community propels it into greatness." (macworld.com) 5/5


Lite version features :

* Game Center integration (scores and achievements)
* 2 game modes (puzzle and free build)
* 3 worlds
* 16 levels
* 20 high quality user generated levels



The full version will keep you entertained for hours :

* 4 worlds, 150 levels and counting
* Additional items and moons
* Unlimited download of user generated levels
* Online scores and achievements
